item.title: 谷物商 ADM 因出现更多会计错误而下滑，年度利润预期下调
item.description: Archer-Daniels-Midland 周二盘前股价下跌 7%，原因是这家全球谷物商下调了调整后的年度利润预期，并表示在发现更多会计违规行为后将修改之前的财务报表。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland shares fell 7% premarket on Tuesday after the global grains merchant cut its adjusted annual profit forecast and said it would amend its previous financial statements after finding additional accounting irregularities.】

item.title: 10 月份石油套期保值活动创纪录，交易商关注市场风险
item.description: 由于中东战火不断，2025 年供需前景看跌，引发原油价格大幅波动，投资者在 10 月份将石油期货和期权交易量提高到创纪录的水平，以规避日益增长的不确定性。【原文：Investors ramped up oil futures and options trading in October to record levels in a bid to hedge growing uncertainty as war rages on in the Middle East and a bearish 2025 supply and demand outlook looms, triggering big swings in crude prices.】

item.title: 人工智能技术需求强劲，杜邦上调全年利润预期，高于预期
item.description: 由于电子产品和人工智能技术需求强劲，工业材料制造商杜邦公司周二上调了全年盈利预期，高于市场预期。【原文：DuPont de Nemours raised its full-year profit forecast above Street estimates on Tuesday after the industrial materials maker beat third-quarter earnings target on strong demand for electronics and artificial intelligence-based technology.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国做出决定，世界市场坚挺
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 过去十年间，富国银行在州团体中的政治支出增加了两倍
item.description: 根据公开数据和富国银行发言人的说法，在过去十年中，富国银行对专注于影响州选举的团体的捐款增加了两倍，因为这家零售银行巨头试图左右地方一级的决策。【原文：Over the past decade, Wells Fargo has tripled donations to groups focused on influencing state elections as the retail banking giant tries to sway local level policymaking, according to public data and a bank spokesperson.】

item.title: 马斯克现在说，为人类驾驶员制造价值 2.5 万美元的特斯拉 "毫无意义
item.description: 路透社 4 月份报道称，特斯拉取消了长期承诺的价值 2.5 万美元的下一代电动汽车计划，这家汽车制造商的股价随即暴跌。首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）急忙在他的社交媒体网络 X 上作出回应。【原文：When Reuters reported in April that Tesla had scrapped plans for a long-promised, next-generation $25,000 electric vehicle, the automaker’s stock plunged. Chief Executive Elon Musk rushed to respond on X, his social-media network.】

item.title: 通用汽车因起火风险召回 107 辆 Bolt 汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周二表示，通用汽车公司将因起火风险召回 107 辆 Bolt EV 和 EUV 汽车。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday General Motors would recall 107 Bolt EV and EUV vehicles over a fire risk.】

item.title: 华尔街期待 CVS 展示执行计划
item.description: CVS Health 的大卫-乔伊纳（David Joyner）周三首次以首席执行官的身份参加财报电话会议时，预计将谈到他将如何比前任首席执行官更好地管理医疗保险业务中不断上涨的患者费用，尤其是在竞争对手在最近的财务报告中显示出这方面的进展之后。【原文：CVS Health's David Joyner is expected to address how he will better manage rising patient costs in the Medicare business than his predecessor when he tackles his first earnings call as CEO on Wednesday, particularly after rivals have shown progress on that front in recent financial reports.】

item.title: 焦虑的全球投资者为期待已久的美国大选结果做好准备
item.description: 周二，美国人前往投票站投票，为戏剧性的美国大选周期画上了句号，近几个月来，大选牵动着债券、股票和其他资产的走势，随着选举结果越来越明朗，可能会进一步左右市场。【原文：Global investors were on edge as Americans headed to the polls on Tuesday, drawing to a close a dramatic U.S. election cycle that has moved bonds, stocks and other assets in recent months and could further sway markets as results become clearer.】

item.title: 聚焦：沃尔玛和其他美国零售商在不温不火的假日季到来之前减少进口圣诞商品
item.description: 进口数据显示，圣诞老人今年为美国送来的圣诞树、玩具和装饰品没有近几年那么多，包括沃尔玛在内的零售商在这个预计不景气的假日季节到来之前减少了节日产品的进口。【原文：Santa Claus is not delivering as many Christmas trees, toys and decorations to the United States this year as in recent years, import data shows, with retailers including Walmart bringing in less holiday product ahead of what is expected to be a so-so holiday season.】

item.title: 欧洲需求疲软，可口可乐欧洲太平洋伙伴公司下调年度销售预期
item.description: 可口可乐公司的装瓶部门可口可乐欧洲太平洋伙伴公司周二下调了年度销售预期，以应对欧洲饮料需求的减少，以及与中东冲突有关的印尼市场的疲软。【原文：Coca-Cola Europacific Partners , a bottling unit of Coca-Cola , lowered its annual sales forecast on Tuesday in response to reduced demand for beverages in Europe, as well as weakness in Indonesia linked to the Middle East conflict.】

item.title: 华尔街为美国大选日做准备，期货市场保持平静
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货在大选日投票前持稳，交易商为未来几个交易日的震荡交易做好准备，直至宣布明确的获胜者。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were steady on Tuesday ahead of election day voting, with traders girding up for volatile trading over the coming few sessions until a clear winner is declared.】

item.title: 消息人士称，税务欺诈调查人员搜查了 Netflix 在巴黎和阿姆斯特丹的办公室
item.description: 一位法国司法界人士周二表示，调查人员搜查了美国流媒体巨头 Netflix 在法国和荷兰的办公室，作为对税务欺诈洗钱行为初步调查的一部分。【原文：Investigators searched the offices of U.S. streaming giant Netflix in France and the Netherlands as part of a preliminary investigation into tax fraud laundering, a French judicial source said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国空中出租车制造商 Lilium 聘请毕马威会计师事务所探讨并购方案
item.description: 德国空中出租车制造商 Lilium 因陷入现金危机而准备申请破产，该公司周二表示，已聘请毕马威会计师事务所探讨并购方案。【原文：German air-taxi maker Lilium , which is set to file for insolvency after running into a cash crisis, said on Tuesday it had hired consultancy KPMG to explore merger and acquisition options.】

item.title: 法国 Believe 公司在美国与 UMG 公司面临 5 亿美元的版权纠纷。
item.description: 法国数字音乐公司 Believe 周二推迟开盘，股价上涨 1.6%，此前环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）在美国提起版权侵权诉讼，要求赔偿至少 5 亿美元（4.5909 亿欧元）。【原文：Shares in French digital music company Believe rose 1.6% in a delayed start to trading on Tuesday after Universal Music Group filed a copyright infringement complaint in the U.S., seeking damages of at least $500 million (459.09 million euros).】

item.title: 特斯拉将德国千兆工厂员工工资提高 4
item.description: 美国电动汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）周二表示，自 11 月初以来，其位于柏林郊外的德国千兆工厂已将所有员工的工资提高了 4%。【原文：Tesla has raised the wages of all employees at its German gigafactory outside Berlin by 4% since the start of November, the U.S. electric carmaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 外汇交易员为美国大选后的剧烈波动做好准备
item.description: 随着 2024 年美国大选结果的逐渐揭晓，货币交易员们急于对冲隔夜可能出现的大幅价格波动，从而将欧元和墨西哥比索的期权波动率推至 2016 年投票以来的最高点。【原文：Currency traders rushed to hedge against big overnight price movements that might ensue as the results of the 2024 U.S. election trickle out, pushing options volatility for the euro and Mexican peso to the highest since the 2016 vote.】

item.title: 贝莱德承诺收购股权后保持 Naturgy 上市地位
item.description: 美国基金管理公司贝莱德提交的一份股票市场文件显示，贝莱德承诺至少在三年内不支持西班牙公用事业公司 Naturgy 退市，以赢得政府对其收购该集团股份的批准。【原文：BlackRock committed not to support a delisting of Spanish utility Naturgy for at least three years to win government approval for its acquisition of a stake in the group, a stock market filing by the U.S. fund manager showed.】

item.title: 美国初创公司 Axiom Space 探索利用印度火箭执行太空任务
item.description: 一位高级主管周二表示，总部位于美国的初创公司 Axiom Space 正在探索使用印度的运载火箭来支持其国际空间站任务。【原文：U.S.-based startup Axiom Space is exploring using Indian launch vehicles to support its international space station mission, a senior executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 法航荷航股价下跌，摩根士丹利下调股票评级
item.description: 摩根士丹利将法航荷航的股票评级从 "等权重 "下调至 "减持 "后，该公司股价周二下跌。【原文：Air France KLM shares fell on Tuesday after Morgan Stanley cut its rating on the stock to 'underweight' from 'equal weight'.】

item.title: 富士康称 10 月份营收同比增长 8.59%，第四季度前景良好
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商台湾富士康周二公布，10 月份营收同比增长 8.59%，达到 8048 亿新台币（约合 252.0 亿美元），创下历史最高纪录。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, on Tuesday reported revenue for October rose 8.59% year-on-year to reach the highest on record for the month at T$804.8 billion ($25.20 billion).】

item.title: 英国监管机构称沃达丰与三巨头 190 亿美元的合作可能会继续进行
item.description: 由于英国对投资的需求超过了对短期竞争的担忧，沃达丰与和记黄埔旗下 Three UK 公司价值 190 亿美元的合并案很可能会获得监管部门的绿灯。【原文：The $19 billion merger between Vodafone and Hutchison's Three UK is likely to be given the regulatory green light as Britain's need for investment outweighs short-term competition concerns.】

item.title: 韩国因收集用户数据对 Meta 罚款约 1500 万美元
item.description: 首尔数据保护机构表示，韩国已责令 Facebook 所有者 Meta Platforms 支付 216.2 亿韩元（1567 万美元）的罚款，因为该公司被发现在没有法律依据的情况下收集用户敏感数据并将其提供给广告商。【原文：South Korea has ordered Facebook owner Meta Platforms to pay 21.62 billion won ($15.67 million) in fines after finding it had collected sensitive user data and given it to advertisers without a legal basis, Seoul's data protection agency said.】

item.title: 中国与欧洲的电动汽车争端乱象使贸易紧张局势继续受控
item.description: 由于担心中国和其他主要出口国之间的关税战扩大，世界第二大经济体与欧盟之间的外交活动仍在继续，即使有关电动汽车的贸易谈判也陷入僵局。【原文：Fears of a widening tariff war between China and other major exporting nations are keeping diplomacy between the world's second-largest economy and the European Union alive, even as trade talks over electric vehicles stall.】

item.title: 雨果博斯第三季度营业利润超预期
item.description: 本周二，Hugo Boss 第三季度营业利润略高于市场预期，该公司报告称，在中国需求持续疲软的情况下，经货币调整后集团销售额增长了 1%。【原文：Hugo Boss' third-quarter operating profit slightly beat market expectations on Tuesday, as it reported a 1% increase in currency-adjusted group sales amid persistently weak demand in China.】

item.title: 任天堂将年度利润预期下调 10%，原因是 Switch 销售放缓
item.description: 任天堂周二将截至 2025 年 3 月的年度营业利润预期下调了 10%，降至 3,600 亿日元（23.6 亿美元），原因是其老化的 Switch 游戏机失去了动力。【原文：Nintendo on Tuesday cut its operating profit forecast for the year to March 2025 by 10% to 360 billion yen ($2.36 billion), as its ageing Switch console loses steam.】

item.title: 欧洲第三季度半程：投资者看好经济增长但担忧中国经济
item.description: 尽管中国需求疲软值得警惕，但欧洲第三季度的盈利大多超出了市场的低预期，投资者对盈利的回报也比往年更为丰厚。【原文：Europe's third-quarter earnings have mostly topped markets' low expectations and investors are rewarding beats more handsomely than they have in years, even though weak China demand is a cause for caution.】

item.title: 日本利用美国芯片初创公司 Tenstorrent 帮助培训新一波工程师
item.description: 由苹果公司和英特尔公司的资深人士创建的硅谷人工智能芯片初创公司 Tenstorrent 表示，它已与日本政府达成协议，将在五年内帮助其美国办事处培训多达 200 名日本芯片设计师。【原文：Tenstorrent, a Silicon Valley artificial intelligence chip startup founded by Apple and Intel veterans, said it had won a deal with the Japanese government to help train up to 200 Japanese chip designers at its U.S. offices over five years.】

item.title: 消息人士称，在 SpaceX 的要求下，台湾供应商将生产转移到了国外
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）要求台湾供应商将生产转移到岛外，据设备制造商雇用的和与这些供应商关系密切的消息来源和公司文件称，这导致一些供应商将其供应链的一部分迁往岛外。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX asked Taiwanese suppliers to transfer manufacturing off the island, leading to some relocating portions of their supply chain, according to sources employed by and close to the equipment makers and corporate documents.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场为大选日做好准备
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】
